pr_title: CATROID-641 Refresh landing page after download is finished

timeline.message: CATROID-641 Refresh landing page after download is finished
CATROID-641 Refresh landing page after download is finished

timeline.bodyText: please revert the changes to this file, see my next comment to know how to get rid of EmptyFunctionBlock lint warning
timeline.author: ndrnour

timeline.bodyText: please change to override fun onUserCanceledDownload(url: String) = Unit to get rid of the lint warning
timeline.author: ndrnour
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,49 @@

+package org.catrobat.catroid.utils
+
+import org.catrobat.catroid.scratchconverter.Client.ProjectDownloadCallback
+import org.catrobat.catroid.ui.recyclerview.fragment.MainMenuFragment
+import java.lang.ref.WeakReference
+
+object ProjectDownloadUtil : ProjectDownloadCallback {
+    private var fragment: WeakReference<MainMenuFragment>? = null
+    fun setFragment(fragment: MainMenuFragment) {
+        this.fragment = WeakReference<MainMenuFragment>(fragment)
+    }
+
+    override fun onDownloadFinished(catrobatProgramName: String, url: String) {
+        fragment?.get()?.setAndLoadCurrentProject() }
+
+    @Suppress("EmptyFunctionBlock")
+    override fun onDownloadStarted(string: String) {
+    }
+
+    @Suppress("EmptyFunctionBlock")
+    override fun onDownloadProgress(progress: Int, url: String) {
+    }
+
+    @Suppress("EmptyFunctionBlock")
+    override fun onUserCanceledDownload(url: String) {

timeline.bodyText: override fun onDownloadProgress(progress: Int, url: String) = Unit

timeline.bodyText: please change it to private lateinit var fragment: WeakReference<MainMenuFragment> then in line 36, no need for ? operator fragment.get().setAndLoadCurrentProject()
